00050 
00051 
00052 template<typename FFTFloat>
00053 class multi_downconvert_toBC : public multi_downconvert_processor<FFTFloat> {
00054 public:
00055   typedef boost::shared_ptr<multi_downconvert_toBC<FFTFloat> > sptr;
00056   typedef typename multi_downconvert_processor<FFTFloat>::ptree ptree;
00057   typedef typename multi_downconvert_processor<FFTFloat>::service service;
00058   typedef typename multi_downconvert_processor<FFTFloat>::filter_param filter_param;
00059   typedef typename multi_downconvert_processor<FFTFloat>::overlap_save_type overlap_save_type;
00060   typedef typename multi_downconvert_processor<FFTFloat>::const_iterator const_iterator;
00061 
00062   multi_downconvert_toBC(const boost::property_tree::ptree& config)
00063     : multi_downconvert_processor<FFTFloat>(config)
00064     , broadcaster_(network::broadcaster::broadcaster::make(config.get_child("Broadcaster")))
00065     , started_(false)
00066     , station_info_(config.get<std::string>("StationInfo")) {}
00067 
00068   virtual ~multi_downconvert_toBC() {}
00069 
00070 protected:
00071   virtual void dump(typename service::sptr sp, const_iterator begin, const_iterator end) {
00072     if (not started_) {
00073       broadcaster_->start();
00074       started_= true;
00075     }
00076     typedef typename overlap_save_type::complex_vector_type complex_vector_type;
00077     const size_t bytes_per_sample(3);
00078     // data
00079     std::string s(2*bytes_per_sample*std::distance(begin,end), 0);
00080     std::string::iterator si(s.begin());
00081     for (typename complex_vector_type::const_iterator i(begin); i!=end; ++i) {
00082       si = wave::detail::write_real_sample(si, 8*bytes_per_sample, i->real());
00083       si = wave::detail::write_real_sample(si, 8*bytes_per_sample, i->imag());
00084     }
00085     const network::protocol::iq_info h_iq
00086       (sp->sample_rate_Hz(),
00087        sp->center_frequency_Hz(),
00088        'I', bytes_per_sample, sp->offset_ppb(), sp->offset_ppb_rms());
00089     std::string data(sizeof(network::protocol::iq_info)+s.size(), 0);
00090     std::copy(h_iq.begin(), h_iq.end(), data.begin());
00091     std::copy(s.begin(), s.end(), data.begin()+sizeof(network::protocol::iq_info));
00092     broadcaster_->bc_data(sp->approx_ptime(), sp->stream_name(), "WAV_0000", data);
00093   }
00094   
00095 
00096   virtual processor::result_base::sptr dump(processor::result_base::sptr rp) {
00097     LOG_INFO(str(boost::format("dump: %s") % *rp));
00098     std::ostringstream oss_header;
00099     oss_header << station_info_;
00100     rp->dump_header(oss_header);
00101     std::string header_str(oss_header.str());
00102 
00103     std::ostringstream oss_data;
00104     rp->dump_data(oss_data);
00105     std::string data_str(oss_data.str());
00106     
00107     broadcaster_->bc_data(rp->approx_ptime(), rp->name(), rp->format(), data_str, header_str);
00108     return rp;
00109   }
00110 
00111 private:
00112   network::broadcaster::broadcaster::sptr broadcaster_;
00113   bool              started_;
00114   station_info      station_info_;
00115 } ;
00116 
00117 int main(int argc, char* argv[])
00118 {
00119   boost::program_options::variables_map vm;
00120   try {
00121     vm = process_options("config/multi_downconvert.xml", argc, argv);
00122   } catch (const std::exception &e) {
00123     std::cerr << e.what() << std::endl;
00124     return 1;
00125   }
00126 
00127   boost::filesystem::path p(vm["config"].as<std::string>());
00128   LOGGER_INIT("./Log", p.stem().native());
00129   try {
00130     boost::property_tree::ptree config;
00131     read_xml(vm["config"].as<std::string>(), config, boost::property_tree::xml_parser::no_comments);
00132 
00133     processor::registry::add<writer_txt>("WriterTXT");
00134     processor::registry::add<network::iq_adapter<wave::writer_iq      > >("WriterIQ");
00135     processor::registry::add<network::iq_adapter<FFTProcessor<float > > >("FFTProcessor_FLOAT");
00136     processor::registry::add<network::iq_adapter<FFTProcessor<double> > >("FFTProcessor_DOUBLE");
00137     processor::registry::add<tracking_goertzel_processor>("TrackingGoertzel");
00138 
00139     const std::string stream_name(config.get<std::string>
00140                                   ("MultiDownConverter.server.<xmlattr>.stream_name", "DataIQ"));
00141 
00142     network::client::client<network::iq_adapter<repack_processor<multi_downconvert_toBC<double> > > >
00143       c(config.get_child("MultiDownConverter"));
00144         
00145     const std::set<std::string> streams(c.ls());
00146     if (streams.find(stream_name) != streams.end())
00147       ASSERT_THROW(c.connect_to(stream_name) == true);
00148     else
00149       throw std::runtime_error(str(boost::format("stream '%s' is not available")
00150                                    % stream_name));
00151     c.start();
00152     run_in_thread(network::get_io_service());
00153   } catch (const std::exception &e) {
00154     LOG_ERROR(e.what()); 
00155     std::cerr << e.what() << std::endl;
00156     return 1;
00157   }
00158   return 0;
00159 }
